analysis.description:
MainBonus.ImmediateProfit (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#748-756) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- acc.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#756)

MainBonus.Withdraw (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#813-826) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- acc.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#823-824)

MainBonus.MasterWithdraw (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#826-832) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- master.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/20/0x51a1a60ae2310e34295a18b559cac9e4140303d7.sol#832)
